content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5), boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and requires connection via pipes to function.

### Copper plate mine at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) and a stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) which is currently full.
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1) (details not specified in logs).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing pipes
- Ensure to have pipes in inventory before attempting to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure the Offshore Pump is in inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when the furnace is full
- Monitor the furnace inventory to avoid reaching full capacity, which prevents further processing.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
